generate.title: Generate PRD
generate.description: Describe your requirements and we'll generate a structured PRD with stories.

requirements.label: Task Requirements
requirements.placeholder: Describe what you want to build in detail. Include features, requirements, and any specific constraints...

direct.name: Direct
direct.details: Best for simple, single-step tasks that can be completed in one pass. The AI will execute the task immediately without creating intermediate stories.

hybridAuto.name: Hybrid Auto
hybridAuto.details: Ideal for medium-sized tasks. The system generates a PRD with multiple stories and executes them in dependency order. Provides good balance of structure and efficiency.

megaPlan.name: Mega Plan
megaPlan.details: For complex, multi-feature projects. Creates a comprehensive plan with features, stories, and dependencies. Uses parallel execution with Git worktrees for isolation.

prdEditor.title: PRD Editor
prdEditor.description: Drag to reorder, click to expand and edit

actions.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset? This will clear all stories.

empty.title: No stories yet
empty.description: Generate a PRD from your requirements or add stories manually.

worktree.title: Git Worktree
worktree.description: Run each story in an isolated git worktree
worktree.tooltip: Git worktrees allow isolated development without switching branches. Each feature gets its own working directory, preventing conflicts and enabling parallel development.
worktree.disabledHint: Enable to develop in an isolated Git worktree branch

errors.invalidBranchName: Branch name must start with a letter and contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, or slashes
errors.branchTooLong: Branch name must be less than 100 characters
